snippet: The photographer Melissa Cacciola set out to capture skateboarders ‘energy in a static way. The result is “Flip It and Reverse It,” a series of 35 portraits.
abstract: Photographer Melissa Cacciola uses the tintype, 19th century technique, to capture the physicality of New York City's skateboarders.
lead_paragraph: The photographer Melissa Cacciola set out to capture skateboarders ‘energy in a static way. The result is “Flip It and Reverse It,” a series of 35 portraits.
